Package slotmachine.view

Class ConsoleLoggerCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • slotmachine.view.ConsoleLoggerCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameCallback
    public class ConsoleLoggerCallback
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameCallback
    An implementation of GameCallback which uses a Logger to log game events to the console.

    Important! DO NOT EDIT THE STATIC BLOCK THAT SETS UP THE LOGGER OR IT'S DECLARATION!

    Note: Logging message format should be consistent with the output trace.

    Author:
    YOU!
    See Also:
    GameCallback, GameCallbackCollection

        Updates the view with the state and outcome of each line when applying betting result for each line
        Specified by:
        lineResult in interface GameCallback
        Parameters:
        player - the current player
        hasBet - true if there was a bet placed on the line, otherwise false
